name: Pumpkin Moonshine
description:
Mayhem, mystery and potential doom await you in this procedurally generated action-platformer!  A new adventure every time!

This game was originally created for the Salt World Spooky Hallowe'en/Racehorse Names game Jam in September, 2013.

Story:

You live in the middle of the wilderness, and you are quite lonely.  What better way to make new friends than to brew a batch of Pumpkin Moonshine and throw a party!  To make the most friends, you must gather the best moonshine ingredients you can.  The only problem is that the best pumpkins grow inside a nearby volcano.  But don't worry, the volcano is dormant... or is it?

Controls:

W - jump/let go of rope.

A - left.

D- right.

S - let go of rope.

CONTROL - deploy rope.

SPACE - dig up the contents of a grave.

You may also use a Game Pad. Follow the onscreen instructions displayed at the Title Screen.

How to play:

Avoid getting swallowed by the ever rising lava by moving upward and off the top of the screen.

Dig up Pumpkins and other items to add to your Pumpkin Moonshine from graves, which are marked with a cross.

There is one Pumpkin hidden inside each screen within the Volcano.

Try to find those special ingredients!

Current Version:  0.0.148

HOW MANY DUDES/DUDETTES CAN YOU GET TO COME TO YOUR MOONEY PARTY???
